cl_sync_io Struct Reference
[cl_sync_io]

 callback to invoke when this IO is finished

Detailed Description

Anchor for synchronous transfer.

This is allocated on a stack by thread doing synchronous transfer, and a pointer to this structure is set up in every page submitted for transfer. Transfer completion routine updates anchor and wakes up waiting thread when transfer is complete.
